    • Method Detail

      • forceMarkNotPersisting

        void forceMarkNotPersisting()
        This is called to force this bean to not be persisted.

      • setPersistenceRequired

        void setPersistenceRequired(boolean persisted)
        Parameters:
        persisted - when false (default is true), the document will not be persisted This needs to be visible to rules so that certain utilities which interact with IDocumentProduction implementations can set it so that things work correctly

      • doesNotRequirePersistence

        boolean doesNotRequirePersistence()
        If true, the document will be persisted
        Returns:
        true if the document will be persisted

      • setLocale

        void setLocale(ILocale locale)
        Deprecated. use set language instead
        Sets the locale in which the document is created in. This should not be changed once the document is stored
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale

      • getLocale

        ILocale getLocale()
        Deprecated. see getDocumentLanugage() instead
        Gets the locale in which the document was created in. A null value means that it is not clear which language the document was created in. Most possibly, it is the default locale of the application.
        Returns:
        locale

      • setDocumentLanguage

        void setDocumentLanguage(ILocale language)
        Sets the language in which the document is created in. This should not be changed once the document is stored
        Parameters:
        language - the the language

      • getDocumentLanguage

        ILocale getDocumentLanguage()
        Gets the language in which the document was created in. A null value means that it is not clear which language the document was created in. Most possibly, it is the default locale of the application.
        Returns:
        language

      • isCachedContentExists

        boolean isCachedContentExists()
                              throws com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.PluginException
        Returns the the cached status about whether the document content exists in the document content source. On the first call on the entity instance, it will call into document content source plugin to get the status and cache the result for future calls
        Returns:
        true if the document content exists in the document content source
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.PluginException - if any exception ocurrs during call to the plugin

      • getIcon

        java.lang.String getIcon()
        Returns the name of an icon image to represent this document. The result is based on the document's mime type.
        Returns:
        a string identifying an icon for this document
